Package vhdlgenerator.component

Class ComponentUtil

java.lang.Object
vhdlgenerator.component.ComponentUtil
public final class ComponentUtil extends Object
some utility method for frame/pane creation
Author:
DOUDOU DIAWARA

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static File
    chooseFile(Component parent)
    open the File manager Explorer to choose a file.
    static File
    chooseFile(Component parent, String title)
    open the File manager Explorer to choose a file or directory.
    static String
    chooseFolder(Component parent)
    this method open a Frame to select a Directory to create the VHDL component see ComponentUtil
    static void
    errorFrame(String error_msg)
    this method open a frame with a error_msg.
    static void
    openFileGenerated(String path)
    this method open a successful frame when a file is generated in the component library and then call showFile(String) to open the file
    static void
    showFile(String file_path)
    this method open a file with the default Application on the system. if there's no default application associated with the file then the program will try to open the file Directory if a error occur a error message is generated on the screen.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • errorFrame

      public static void errorFrame(String error_msg)
      this method open a frame with a error_msg.
      Parameters:
      error_msg - the error message to display

    • showFile

      public static void showFile(String file_path)
      this method open a file with the default Application on the system. if there's no default application associated with the file then the program will try to open the file Directory if a error occur a error message is generated on the screen.
      Parameters:
      file_path - the path of the file to open
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if file_path is null.

    • chooseFile

      public static File chooseFile(Component parent, String title)
      open the File manager Explorer to choose a file or directory.
      Parameters:
      parent - the component that the File Manager depend on for LookAndFeel,positioning
      title - of the FileChooser.
      Returns:
      the file or the directory selected otherwise return null.

    • chooseFile

      public static File chooseFile(Component parent) throws NullPointerException
      open the File manager Explorer to choose a file.
      Parameters:
      parent - the component that the File Manager depend on for LookAndFeel,positioning
      Returns:
      the file selected.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the path selected is null.

    • chooseFolder

      public static String chooseFolder(Component parent) throws NullPointerException
      this method open a Frame to select a Directory to create the VHDL component see ComponentUtil
      Parameters:
      parent - the component that the File Manager depend on for LookAndFeel,positioning
      Returns:
      path of the directory selected if valid otherwise null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • openFileGenerated

      public static void openFileGenerated(String path)
      this method open a successful frame when a file is generated in the component library and then call showFile(String) to open the file
      Parameters:
      path - to the file that was generated
